code: import{useAppDispatch}from"../../../../../store/hooks";import{dispatchFromCurrency,dispatchToCurrency}from"../../../../../store/slices/exchange";var useCurrency=function useCurrency(){var dispatch=useAppDispatch();var setFromCurrency=function setFromCurrency(shortName,fullName){return dispatch(dispatchFromCurrency({shortName:shortName,fullName:fullName}));};var setToCurrency=function setToCurrency(shortName,fullName){return dispatch(dispatchToCurrency({shortName:shortName,fullName:fullName}));};return{setFromCurrency:setFromCurrency,setToCurrency:setToCurrency};};export default useCurrency;
